title: Need help identifying a round condensed mono typeface
content:
Hey Typophilers,

Can anyone help me identify the round condensed mono typeface that reads "SUSTAINISM"?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419104947im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-31%20at%204_4202.57.39%20PM.png)

Thanks!
author: Ken W

comments.content: More specifically I think it is Letter Gothic MT Bold that has had a stroke added to weight it up and achieve the rounded corners.
